cn.jpush.api.push.model

类 PushPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.jpush.api.push.model.PushPayload
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PushModel

    public class PushPayload
extends Object
implements PushModel
    The object you should to build for sending a push. Basically start with newBuilder() method to build a PushPayload object. alertAll() is a shortcut for quickly build payload of alert to all platform and all audience; mesageAll() is a shortcut for quickly build payload of message to all platform and all audience.
